channel.title: Center of Excellence on Burgers & Bytes
channel.description: Recent content in Center of Excellence on Burgers & Bytes

item.title: A solid foundation of the Power Platform
item.description: In today’s rapidly evolving digital landscape, organizations often find themselves relying on outdated Excel-based processes, which pose significant risks. However, with the emergence of the Power Platform, a revolutionary low-code development platform, there is a transformative solution at hand. This blog explores the potential of the Power Platform in streamlining operations, mitigating risks, and empowering employees to become citizen developers. Source https://dilbert.com/strip/2007-08-08 Excel as business critical When people ask what exactly you can do with Power Platform, we often make comparisons with what people used to make in Excel.
